metadata.synopsis: |Fallback AD when an NPC is not available for dialog because they're too far from their scene, or involved in addressing a crime (or reacting to another disturbance -- anything from "investigating" to "fleeing away in panic"). Will never trigger for BEAST or MONSTER.|
